attributes.action: WE WANT DC CLAIR LONGMORE-PC MIKE ROBERTS- PC ROBYN - PC TROW SUBJECT TO A FULL PUBLIC ENQUIRY AND PROSECUTED
attributes.additional_details:
I want dc Clair longmore- pc mike roberts -pc robyn -pc trow merseyside police , subject to a full public enquiry , and prosecuted for commiting serious criminal offenses while carrying out there dutys as police offices in 2013-2014.

everyone may view the majority of the evidence available, that proves these so called detectives are disgusting criminals by viewing the campaign video on youtube. the campaign video will be going online once i received permission to publish it from mersey cheshire cps , some evidence can not be published for legal reasons.

rejection.details: The Government cannot comment on individual cases of this nature.
